languages.text: "Я хочу служить Богу-Императору, да. Но там, в Темном городе, я впервые задумался над тем, что куда больше ран и увечий я перенес в руках людей, а не врагов Человечества... что за еретическая мысль..."

traits.locale_text: "Я хочу служить Богу-Императора, да. Но там, в Темном городе, я впервые задумался над тем, что куда больше ран и увечий я перенес в руках людей, а не врагов Человечества... что за еретическая мысль..."

languages.text: "I want to serve the God-Emperor, yes. But in the Dark City, for the first time ever, my mind turned to thinking about how I have suffered more injuries and mutilations at the hands of humans than in the clutches of the enemies of Humanity... The very notion is heretical..."
languages.original_text: "Я хочу служить Богу-Императору, да. Но там, в Темном городе, я впервые задумался над тем, что куда больше ран и увечий я перенес в руках людей, а не врагов Человечества... что за еретическая мысль..."

traits.locale_text: "I want to serve the God-Emperor, yes. But in the Dark City, for the first time ever, my mind turned to thinking about how I have suffered more injuries and mutilations at the hands of humans than in the clutches of the enemies of Humanity... The very notion is heretical..."

"I want to serve the God-Emperor, yes. But in the Dark City, for the first time ever, my mind turned to thinking about how I have suffered more injuries and mutilations at the hands of humans than in the clutches of the enemies of Humanity... The very notion is heretical..."

"I want to serve the God-Emperor, yes. But in the Dark City, for the first time ever, my mind turned to thinking about how I have suffered more injuries and mutilations at the hands of humans than in the clutches of the enemies of Humanity... The very notion is heretical..."

"I want to serve the God-Emperor, yes. But in the Dark City, for the first time ever, my mind turned to thinking about how I have suffered more injuries and mutilations at the hands of humans than in the clutches of the enemies of Humanity... The very notion is heretical..."

languages.text: “我很愿意为神皇效力，这一点毫无疑问。但在黑暗之城的时候，我却第一次想到，人类本身给我带来的伤害与痛苦，比人类之敌带给我的伤害与痛苦还要多……这种想法简直是异端思想……”
languages.original_text: "I want to serve the God-Emperor, yes. But in the Dark City, for the first time ever, my mind turned to thinking about how I have suffered more injuries and mutilations at the hands of humans than in the clutches of the enemies of Humanity... The very notion is heretical..."

traits.locale_text: “我很愿意为神皇效力，这一点毫无疑问。但在黑暗之城的时候，我却第一次想到，人类本身给我带来的伤害与痛苦，比人类之敌带给我的伤害与痛苦还要多……这种想法简直是异端思想……”

languages.text: «Quiero servir al Dios Emperador, claro. Pero en la Ciudad Siniestra, por primera vez, mi mente empezó a pensar en que yo he sufrido más heridas y mutilaciones a manos de humanos que estando en garras de los enemigos de la Humanidad... solo pensarlo ya es una herejía...».
languages.original_text: "I want to serve the God-Emperor, yes. But in the Dark City, for the first time ever, my mind turned to thinking about how I have suffered more injuries and mutilations at the hands of humans than in the clutches of the enemies of Humanity... The very notion is heretical..."

traits.locale_text: «Quiero servir al Dios Emperador, claro. Pero en la Ciudad Siniestra, por primera vez, mi mente empezó a pensar en que yo he sufrido más heridas y mutilaciones a manos de humanos que estando en garras de los enemigos de la Humanidad... solo pensarlo ya es una herejía...».

languages.text: 「俺は神帝陛下に奉仕したい、その通りだ。だが、仄暗き都で、俺は初めて、人類の敵に捕らわれたときよりも、人間の手によって傷つけられ、切り刻まれたときのほうが、いかに苦しかったかを考えるようになった。その考え方はまさに異端だ…」
languages.original_text: "I want to serve the God-Emperor, yes. But in the Dark City, for the first time ever, my mind turned to thinking about how I have suffered more injuries and mutilations at the hands of humans than in the clutches of the enemies of Humanity... The very notion is heretical..."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は神帝陛下に奉仕したい、その通りだ。だが、仄暗き都で、俺は初めて、人類の敵に捕らわれたときよりも、人間の手によって傷つけられ、切り刻まれたときのほうが、いかに苦しかったかを考えるようになった。その考え方はまさに異端だ…」

languages.text: « Oui, je veux servir l'Empereur-Dieu, mais dans la Cité Crépusculaire, pour la toute première fois, je me suis rendu compte que j'avais bien plus souffert aux mains des humains que dans les griffes des ennemis de l'humanité... Une notion pour le moins hérétique, vous en conviendrez... »
languages.original_text: "I want to serve the God-Emperor, yes. But in the Dark City, for the first time ever, my mind turned to thinking about how I have suffered more injuries and mutilations at the hands of humans than in the clutches of the enemies of Humanity... The very notion is heretical..."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, je veux servir l'Empereur-Dieu, mais dans la Cité Crépusculaire, pour la toute première fois, je me suis rendu compte que j'avais bien plus souffert aux mains des humains que dans les griffes des ennemis de l'humanité... Une notion pour le moins hérétique, vous en conviendrez... »

languages.text: "Ich möchte dem Gottimperator dienen, ja. Aber in der Dunklen Stadt wurde mir zum ersten Mal klar, dass ich mehr Verletzungen und Verstümmelungen durch Menschen erleiden musste als durch die Krallen der Feinde der Menschheit ... Allein schon der Gedanke ist ketzerisch ..."
languages.original_text: "I want to serve the God-Emperor, yes. But in the Dark City, for the first time ever, my mind turned to thinking about how I have suffered more injuries and mutilations at the hands of humans than in the clutches of the enemies of Humanity... The very notion is heretical..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte dem Gottimperator dienen, ja. Aber in der Dunklen Stadt wurde mir zum ersten Mal klar, dass ich mehr Verletzungen und Verstümmelungen durch Menschen erleiden musste als durch die Krallen der Feinde der Menschheit ... Allein schon der Gedanke ist ketzerisch ..."

languages.text: "Evet, Tanrı İmparator'a hizmet etmek istiyorum. Fakat Kara Şehir'deyken hayatımda ilk defa zihnimde İnsanlığın düşmanlarının değil, insanların ellerinde nasıl daha çok yaralanıp sakatlandığıma dair fikirler oluşmaya başladı... Bu düşünce bile başlı başına kâfirce."
languages.original_text: "I want to serve the God-Emperor, yes. But in the Dark City, for the first time ever, my mind turned to thinking about how I have suffered more injuries and mutilations at the hands of humans than in the clutches of the enemies of Humanity... The very notion is heretical..."
